tier_4_procedural.case_title: Balu Pandharinath Takle vs. State of Maharashtra
tier_4_procedural.court_name: High Court of Judicature of Bombay

residual_details.additional_facts: The appellant, along with others, was initially charged under sections 395 and 397 IPC, but the court found insufficient evidence for these sections and convicted him under section 394 IPC. The appellant was in custody since August 11, 2000, and had served a significant portion of his sentence by the time of the appeal judgment.

template_label: Voluntarily causing hurt in committing robbery (IPC 394)
